Texts.Chs: 想尝试更简单的生活方式，比如^green;养殖蜜蜂^reset;来获取利润？建造一个^orange;蜂场工作台^reset;来试试。
Texts.Eng: Care to try a simpler life, ^green;breeding bees^reset; and reaping the profits? Build an ^orange;Apiary Crafting Station^reset; and you can get started.

Texts.Chs: 你可以在^orange;蜂场工作台^reset;制作一些你从未见过的新玩意。
Texts.Eng: With the ^orange;Apiary Crafting Station^reset;, you'll be able to craft a whole new array of goods you've likely not seen before!
